title: Preparing for HTB CPTS Exam

title: Solved "Search" Machine by Hack The Box
description: Solved the "Search" machine by Hack The Box, a hard difficulty Windows machine focusing on Kerberoasting, password hunting, and gMSA privilege escalation.

title: Solved and Documented "Blackfield" Machine by Hack The Box
description: Solved and Documented the "Blackfield" machine by Hack The Box, a hard difficulty Windows machine focusing on ASREPRoasting, LSASS dump analysis, and Backup Operators privilege abuse.
